chat_history.message:
Hello,

The package of the order 40690841 could be not delivered because the letter box is not accessible.

Please ask your customer to reschedule the delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.

Valérie DECAMPS

Hello ecomobile,

The delivery instructions have been taken into account by the carrier. The recipient has already scheduled a new delivery to their address for today.

The package is currently being delivered.

Yours truly,
Lucia, customer service Back Market
